alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 1:09PM CDT until April 23 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. Black River Near Galesville affecting Trempealeau and La Crosse Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 44.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 52.0 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
